thread.section_title: Simple Fishing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Simple Fishing | simplefishing.ca
thread.title: Trevor

author: Trevor
title: Trevor
text: I have been receiving the rlm aggressive box for almost 1 full year now, as well as having done an order for other product from them. The value of the product has always met or exceeded expectations, and they went above and beyond when it came to replacing a damaged order. This is truly a top notch buisness and service, and I look forward to being thier customer for a long time to come. Thank you simple fishing!
